Wrth i Jazz Aberhonddu fynd yn rhithwir yn 2020, gwrandwch ar ein podlediad a recordiwyd yn gynharach eleni gyda‚Äôr ddau sy‚Äôn gyfrifol am Glwb Jazz Aberhonddu, Lynne Gornall a Roger Cannon.
Oes gennych chi unrhyw straeon am yr ≈¥yl Jazz?https://t.co/tAvZciJlR4 #breconjazz pic.twitter.com/kufeNlNyr2

As Brecon Jazz is going virtual in 2020, listen to our podcast recorded earlier this year with two of those responsible for Brecon Jazz Club, Lynne Gornall and Roger Cannon. Have you got any stories about the Jazz Festival?

Mae Lloegr wedi cyhoeddi manylion yr "algorithm" sy'n cael ei ddefnyddio i benderfynu graddau mewn dogfen fanwl 319 tudalen- https://t.co/IyrVjbVU2v@cymwysterau_cym / @cbac_wjec / @WG_Education Oes dogfen debyg ar gael / ar y gweill ar gyfer Cymru?

— Mathemateg (@mathemateg) August 16, 2020

dogfen - document

tebyg - similar

ar y gweill - in the pipeline

England has published details of the 'algorithm' used to decide grades in a detailed, 319 page document. @cymwysterau_cym/@cbac_wjec/@WG_Education Is a similar document available/in the pipeline for Wales?

‚ÄúEr bod hyn yn teimlo‚Äôn hynod ryfeddol i ni i gyd, mewn gwirionedd ni ddylai fod oherwydd mae bygythiad pandemig byd-eang wedi bod ar y gofrestr risg ‚Ä¶ am amser hir iawn. Felly hefyd, gyda llaw, y newid yn yr hinsawdd.‚Äù Medd @sophiehowe ar @curve_podcast https://t.co/CinEANeV77

er bod - although

felly hefyd - so, too

gyda llaw - by the way

newid yn yr hinsawdd - climate change

"Although this feels extraordinary to us all, in truth it shouldn't be because the threat of a global pandemic has been on the risk register for a very long time. So too, by the way, is climate change." says @sophiehowe on @curve_podcast

Mae Y Shed yn dathlu ei ben-blwydd cyntaf ddydd Sadwrn
Ac i dathlu, bydd un person lwcus yn derbyn bag o anrhegion gan fusnesau @YShedMeliden
Y cyfan sy'n rhaid i chi ei wneud i ennill yw bod y person cyntaf trwy'r drysau am 9.30am Dydd Sadwrn 15 Awst. Pob lwc! pic.twitter.com/XGzZcSsTQP

— Y Shed (@YShedMeliden) August 12, 2020

rhaid i chi - you‚Äôve got to

y cyfan - all

Y Shed is celebrating its first birthday on Saturday. And to celebrate, one lucky person will receive a bag of gifts from @YShedMeliden businesses. All that you've got to do to win is be the first person through the doors at 9:30 Saturday 15 August. Good Luck!
